TopicTitle: Is there a mod that improves light physics?

Articles.Content: With planet packs with several stars, it looks pretty weird when you have distant stars shining just as brightly as Kerbol is. Are there any mods out there that can correct this?

15 hours ago, Clockwork13 said:

With planet packs with several stars, it looks pretty weird when you have distant stars shining just as brightly as Kerbol is. Are there any mods out there that can correct this?

I think that's an adjustment the planet/system modder has to make to their stars. Grannus in GPP doesn't shine as bright as Ciro.

Distant Objects isnt what OP is looking for.  

 

Kopernicus us can accomplish what you want to do. Editing a light curve can weaken a stars light as you move away from it, so bodies get darker with distance. 

GPP is set up this way. Most other planet creators don’t bother with it because they either don’t care, or don’t have the patience to learn how to do it.
